ygData.subject: Re: What is the best way to raise faction level with the Merchants of Felwithe?
ygData.msgSnippet: remove me from your e-mail list
ygData.messageBody:
remove me from your e-mail list

Karl Hatteland wrote:

> You are amiable to guards, maybe you can get a quest from them that
> better your faction with the merchant. doesent know tho. Avari lvl
> 17(soon 18) Wiz Fenin ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Browne <mbrowne@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 4:50 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] What is the best way to raise faction
> level with the Merchants of Felwithe?Hello, fellow
> Wizards! Several weeks ago I participated in a guild war and
> slew a High Elf not knowing that there would be a faction
> hit as a result. Well, I can no longer purchase or sell
> items in Felwithe. I've tried everything that I know of to
> improve my faction standing with the Merchants there, but to
> no avail. My faction standing with the guards is "amiable"
> -- It is with the "Merchants" that I need a faction
> adjustment. Does anyone have any ideas? Suggestions?
> Personal experience? Would appreciate any and all
> advice. Wizzy LightseekerL25 Gnome WizardSolusek Ro
>
